content: follow the braided crochet pumpkin pattern to create this adorable gourd made from stitches that look like braids of wheat or feathers -------------------------- you will receive -------------------------- 1 pdf digital download file for braided pumpkin crochet pattern instant download as soon as payment clears ravelry s system written in english and u s crochet terms ---------------- yarn used ---------------- worsted weight #4 ------------------------------------- finished measurements ------------------------------------- varies by stitch and row count green 4 x 2 75 10 x 6 strip orange 5 x 3 25 15 5 x 7 25 strip white 6 5 x 3 75 22 x 8 strip ----------------- skill level ----------------- intermediate ---------- notes ---------- ~gauge is included in this pattern ~this pattern has been checked for accuracy although this has been tested please note that small errors can still slip by i am happy to assist if you need any help ~this is a free pattern on my blog but you can also purchase this listing for the ad-free downloadable pdf version ----------------------- downloading ----------------------- ~download instructions~ go to my notebook and find the pattern image for this purchase and a download link will accompany it i cannot email patterns to you ------------------------ where to print ------------------------ ~ home printer ~ local copy store -
